synopsis.text: Shougo Ryuujin, a typical high school student, finds himself transformed into the powerful Bone Fighter Dragonbone when he comes into possession of a unique Bone Card. Alongside his fellow high school students Tyrone, Antonio, and Luke, they become the White Bone warriors, tasked with defending Earth from the malevolent forces of Dark Bone, who threaten to annihilate the world. But as they delve deeper into the battle, they begin to question the true identity of their enemy. Could it be that the real threat lies within themselves? Based on the digital card game project, Majin Bone, the anime follows the journey of these young warriors as they navigate the complexities of their newfound powers and the mystery surrounding their adversaries.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
